sentences.en: Although she often disagreed with me, she was always courteous.
sentences.cn: 尽管她常常和我意见不一, 但她总是很谦恭有礼.

sentences.en: Andy was a humble, courteous and gentle man.
sentences.cn: 安迪是个谦逊而且彬彬有礼的绅士。

sentences.en: He is courteous to his guests.
He is direct and courteous but distant.
sentences.cn: 他直截了当且礼数周全，但是态度冷淡。

sentences.en: He must have boys who were willing, civil , prompt, courteous to everybody.
sentences.cn: 他手下的服务员,必须听话 、 懂规矩 、 动作迅速 、 对任何人都有礼貌.

sentences.en: He was a kind and courteous man.
sentences.cn: 他为人友善，而且彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: He was a nice fellow, very quiet and courteous.
sentences.cn: 他是个好小伙，非常温和，彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: He was courteous always, but aloof, remote.
sentences.cn: 他常常很客气, 但又那么冷淡 、 疏远.

sentences.en: My friend's reply was courteous but firm.
sentences.cn: 我朋友的回答很客气，但很坚决。

sentences.en: She was unfailingly courteous and helpful.
sentences.cn: 她无论什么时候都彬彬有礼,乐于助人.

sentences.en: Staff are courteous but never intrusive.
sentences.cn: 员工谦恭有礼却从不让人感到唐突。

sentences.en: The staff are always courteous and helpful.
sentences.cn: 员工们总是彬彬有礼、乐于帮助。

sentences.en: The staff is well trained in courteous and attentive service to each and every guest.
sentences.cn: 员工训练有素，为每一位客人提供礼貌周到的服务。

sentences.en: Unlike Heraclius and Kavadh, Tai - tsung gave these envoys a courteous hearing.
sentences.cn: 和赫拉克利乌斯和卡瓦达不同,太宗谦卑地听取了这些使者的来意.

words.tran_cn: 殷勤的；被承认的；出于礼节的
尊严而有礼貌的；奉承的；有宫廷气派的，威严的

trans.tran_cn: 有礼貌的，谦恭的，殷勤的，客气
trans.tran_en: polite and showing respect for other people
